CDR_L1D_MSHR_FILL_FIFO_DEPTH.desc: L1D DMQ size equals MRQ size to avoid deadlock

CDR_L2_ROWS_PER_BANK.desc: L2 data array rows per bank

CDR_L2_MSHR_DEPTH.desc: L2 max outstanding misses for all rows and banks

CDR_L2_LSU_RD_REQ_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: lsu to l2 request buffer size, loads

CDR_L2_LSU_WR_REQ_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: lsu to l2 request buffer size, stores

CDR_L2_LSU_RD_RESP_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: l2 to lsu response queue size, loads

CDR_L2_L1C_RD_REQ_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: I$ to l2 request buffer size

CDR_L1C_LSU_RD_RESP_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: l2 to I$ response queue size

CDR_L2_BIU_REQ_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: Is this snoop? Add snoop response

CDR_L2_BIU_RESP_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: Response (Q in L2) back from L3

CDR_L3_L2_RESP_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: Response (Q in L3) from L3 to L2

CDR_L2_BIU_PIPE_REQ_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: Resp from BIU to banks in L2

CDR_L2_MISS_PENDING_BUFFER_SIZE.desc: L2 MSHR per row per bank

CDR_L1_PIPE_READ_REQ_QUEUE_SIZE.desc: Read req from I$ or D$

CDR_GHT_DATA_WIDTH.desc: Global history table data width, bits

CDR_TAGE_NHISTORYTABLES.desc: Number of TAGE Tables excluding BIM

CDR_RVA23U_OPT_ZAMA16B.desc: 23U Optional, Zama16b, misaligned ld/st and AMO

CDR_RVN_SUPPORT.desc: Is the N extension still viable? User level interrupt extension

TBD-5.desc: Andes Vector Small INT Handling Extension Support

CDR_NUM_SLICES.desc: Number of execute slices--affects latency matrix

CDR_INSTRS_PER_SLICE.desc: Number of instructions executed per slice

CDR_PRF_WRITE_PORTS.desc: PRF write ports (model has per slice)

CDR_PRF_READ_PORTS.desc: PRF read ports (model has per slice)
